diagrams.content:
# RF Signal Analyzer Architecture

## High-Level System Architecture

The RF Signal Analyzer application is designed with a modern, scalable architecture that separates concerns between the frontend user interface, backend processing, and data storage. This architecture enables researchers to efficiently upload, process, and analyze RF signal data.

```svg
<svg width="800" height="500" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
    <!-- Background -->
    <rect width="800" height="500" fill="#f8f9fa" rx="10" ry="10"/>
    
    <!-- Title -->
    <text x="400" y="40" font-family="Arial" font-size="24" text-anchor="middle" font-weight="bold" fill="#333">RF Signal Analyzer - System Architecture</text>
    
    <!-- Frontend Layer -->
    <rect x="100" y="100" width="600" height="80" rx="10" ry="10" fill="#61dafb" opacity="0.8" stroke="#333" stroke-width="2"/>
    <text x="400" y="145" font-family="Arial" font-size="18" text-anchor="middle" font-weight="bold" fill="#333">Frontend (React/Vue.js with D3.js)</text>
    
    <!-- Backend Layer -->
    <rect x="100" y="220" width="600" height="80" rx="10" ry="10" fill="#4caf50" opacity="0.8" stroke="#333" stroke-width="2"/>
    <text x="400" y="265" font-family="Arial" font-size="18" text-anchor="middle" font-weight="bold" fill="#333">Backend (Python with NumPy, SciPy, Pandas)</text>
    
    <!-- Database Layer -->
    <rect x="100" y="340" width="600" height="80" rx="10" ry="10" fill="#ff9800" opacity="0.8" stroke="#333" stroke-width="2"/>
    <text x="400" y="385" font-family="Arial" font-size="18" text-anchor="middle" font-weight="bold" fill="#333">Database (PostgreSQL/MySQL)</text>
    
    <!-- Arrows -->
    <!-- Frontend to Backend -->
    <path d="M400,180 L400,220" stroke="#333" stroke-width="2" marker-end="url(#arrowhead)">
        <animate attributeName="stroke-dashoffset" from="100" to="0" dur="3s" repeatCount="indefinite"/>
    </path>
    <!-- Backend to Frontend -->
    <path d="M350,220 L350,180" stroke="#333" stroke-width="2" marker-end="url(#arrowhead)">
        <animate attributeName="stroke-dashoffset" from="100" to="0" dur="3s" repeatCount="indefinite"/>
    </path>
    <!-- Backend to Database -->
    <path d="M400,300 L400,340" stroke="#333" stroke-width="2" marker-end="url(#arrowhead)">
        <animate attributeName="stroke-dashoffset" from="100" to="0" dur="3s" repeatCount="indefinite"/>
    </path>
    <!-- Database to Backend -->
    <path d="M350,340 L350,300" stroke="#333" stroke-width="2" marker-end="url(#arrowhead)">
        <animate attributeName="stroke-dashoffset" from="100" to="0" dur="3s" repeatCount="indefinite"/>
    </path>
    
    <!-- Arrow Definitions -->
    <defs>
        <marker id="arrowhead" markerWidth="10" markerHeight="7" refX="9" refY="3.5" orient="auto">
            <polygon points="0 0, 10 3.5, 0 7" fill="#333"/>
        </marker>
    </defs>
    
    <!-- Data flow animations -->
    <style>
        path {
            stroke-dasharray: 10;
        }
    </style>
</svg>
```

This high-level architecture diagram illustrates the three main layers of the application:

1. **Frontend Layer**: Built with React or Vue.js and D3.js for interactive visualizations, providing researchers with an intuitive interface for data analysis.

2. **Backend Layer**: Powered by Python with scientific libraries (NumPy, SciPy, Pandas) for sophisticated signal processing, peak detection, and outlier identification algorithms.

3. **Database Layer**: Using PostgreSQL or MySQL to store user data, uploaded datasets, analysis results, and user-defined patterns.

The animated arrows represent the bidirectional data flow between layers, showing how information moves through the system during the analysis process.

## Detailed Component Diagram

This diagram breaks down the major components within each layer and their interactions.

```svg
<svg width="900" height="700" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
    <!-- Background -->
    <rect width="900" height="700" fill="#f8f9fa" rx="10" ry="10"/>
    
    <!-- Title -->
    <text x="450" y="40" font-family="Arial" font-size="24" text-anchor="middle" font-weight="bold" fill="#333">RF Signal Analyzer - Component Architecture</text>
    
    <!-- Frontend Components -->
    <rect x="50" y="80" width="800" height="180" rx="10" ry="10" fill="#e3f2fd" stroke="#2196f3" stroke-width="2"/>
    <text x="450" y="100" font-family="Arial" font-size="18" text-anchor="middle" font-weight="bold" fill="#2196f3">Frontend Components</text>
    
    <!-- UI Components -->
    <rect x="80" y="120" width="160" height="60" rx="5" ry="5" fill="#61dafb" stroke="#333" stroke-width="1"/>
    <text x="160" y="155" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" text-anchor="middle" fill="#333">User Interface</text>
    
    <!-- Data Visualization -->
    <rect x="260" y="120" width="160" height="60" rx="5" ry="5" fill="#61dafb" stroke="#333" stroke-width="1"/>
    <text x="340" y="155" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" text-anchor="middle" fill="#333">Data Visualization (D3.js)</text>
    
    <!-- File Upload -->
    <rect x="440" y="120" width="160" height="60" rx="5" ry="5" fill="#61dafb" stroke="#333" stroke-width="1"/>
    <text x="520" y="155" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" text-anchor="middle" fill="#333">File Upload Interface</text>
    
    <!-- Pattern Definition -->
    <rect x="620" y="120" width="160" height="60" rx="5" ry="5" fill="#61dafb" stroke="#333" stroke-width="1"/>
    <text x="700" y="155" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" text-anchor="middle" fill="#333">Pattern Definition UI</text>
    
    <!-- User Authentication -->
    <rect x="80" y="190" width="160" height="60" rx="5" ry="5" fill="#61dafb" stroke="#333" stroke-width="1"/>
    <text x="160" y="225" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" text-anchor="middle" fill="#333">User Authentication</text>
    
    <!-- Results Export -->
    <rect x="260" y="190" width="160" height="60" rx="5" ry="5" fill="#61dafb" stroke="#333" stroke-width="1"/>
    <text x="340" y="225" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" text-anchor="middle" fill="#333">Results Export</text>
    
    <!-- Backend Components -->
    <rect x="50" y="280" width="800" height="180" rx="10" ry="10" fill="#e8f5e9" stroke="#4caf50" stroke-width="2"/>
    <text x="450" y="300" font-family="Arial" font-size="18" text-anchor="middle" font-weight="bold" fill="#4caf50">Backend Components</text>
    
    <!-- API Layer -->
    <rect x="80" y="320" width="160" height="60" rx="5" ry="5" fill="#4caf50" stroke="#333" stroke-width="1"/>
    <text x="160" y="355" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" text-anchor="middle" fill="#333">API Layer</text>
    
    <!-- Signal Processing -->
    <rect x="260" y="320" width="160" height="60" rx="5" ry="5" fill="#4caf50" stroke="#333" stroke-width="1"/>
    <text x="340" y="355" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" text-anchor="middle" fill="#333">Signal Processing</text>
    
    <!-- Peak Detection -->
    <rect x="440" y="320" width="160" height="60" rx="5" ry="5" fill="#4caf50" stroke="#333" stroke-width="1"/>
    <text x="520" y="355" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" text-anchor="middle" fill="#333">Peak Detection</text>
    
    <!-- Outlier Detection -->
    <rect x="620" y="320" width="160" height="60" rx="5" ry="5" fill="#4caf50" stroke="#333" stroke-width="1"/>
    <text x="700" y="355" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" text-anchor="middle" fill="#333">Outlier Detection</text>
    
    <!-- Authentication Service -->
    <rect x="80" y="390" width="160" height="60" rx="5" ry="5" fill="#4caf50" stroke="#333" stroke-width="1"/>
    <text x="160" y="425" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" text-anchor="middle" fill="#333">Authentication Service</text>
    
    <!-- Data Export Service -->
    <rect x="260" y="390" width="160" height="60" rx="5" ry="5" fill="#4caf50" stroke="#333" stroke-width="1"/>
    <text x="340" y="425" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" text-anchor="middle" fill="#333">Data Export Service</text>
    
    <!-- Database Components -->
    <rect x="50" y="480" width="800" height="180" rx="10" ry="10" fill="#fff3e0" stroke="#ff9800" stroke-width="2"/>
    <text x="450" y="500" font-family="Arial" font-size="18" text-anchor="middle" font-weight="bold" fill="#ff9800">Database Components</text>
    
    <!-- User Data -->
    <rect x="80" y="520" width="160" height="60" rx="5" ry="5" fill="#ff9800" stroke="#333" stroke-width="1"/>
    <text x="160" y="555" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" text-anchor="middle" fill="#333">User Data</text>
    
    <!-- Dataset Storage -->
    <rect x="260" y="520" width="160" height="60" rx="5" ry="5" fill="#ff9800" stroke="#333" stroke-width="1"/>
    <text x="340" y="555" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" text-anchor="middle" fill="#333">Dataset Storage</text>
    
    <!-- Analysis Results -->
    <rect x="440" y="520" width="160" height="60" rx="5" ry="5" fill="#ff9800" stroke="#333" stroke-width="1"/>
    <text x="520" y="555" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" text-anchor="middle" fill="#333">Analysis Results</text>
    
    <!-- Pattern Definitions -->
    <rect x="620" y="520" width="160" height="60" rx="5" ry="5" fill="#ff9800" stroke="#333" stroke-width="1"/>
    <text x="700" y="555" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" text-anchor="middle" fill="#333">Pattern Definitions</text>
    
    <!-- Signal Metadata -->
    <rect x="80" y="590" width="160" height="60" rx="5" ry="5" fill="#ff9800" stroke="#333" stroke-width="1"/>
    <text x="160" y="625" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" text-anchor="middle" fill="#333">Signal Metadata</text>
    
    <!-- Connection arrows -->
    <!-- Frontend to Backend -->
    <path d="M450,260 L450,280" stroke="#333" stroke-width="2" marker-end="url(#arrowhead)">
        <animate attributeName="stroke-dashoffset" from="100" to="0" dur="3s" repeatCount="indefinite"/>
    </path>
    
    <!-- Backend to Database -->
    <path d="M450,460 L450,480" stroke="#333" stroke-width="2" marker-end="url(#arrowhead)">
        <animate attributeName="stroke-dashoffset" from="100" to="0" dur="3s" repeatCount="indefinite"/>
    </path>
    
    <!-- Arrow Definitions -->
    <defs>
        <marker id="arrowhead" markerWidth="10" markerHeight="7" refX="9" refY="3.5" orient="auto">
            <polygon points="0 0, 10 3.5, 0 7" fill="#333"/>
        </marker>
    </defs>
    
    <!-- Data flow animations -->
    <style>
        path {
            stroke-dasharray: 10;
        }
    </style>
</svg>
```

This component diagram provides a more detailed view of the system architecture:

1. **Frontend Components**:
   - User Interface: Main application interface
   - Data Visualization: D3.js-powered charts and graphs
   - File Upload Interface: For CSV and XLS data
   - Pattern Definition UI: Interface for defining signal patterns
   - User Authentication: Login and user management
   - Results Export: PDF/CSV export functionality

2. **Backend Components**:
   - API Layer: RESTful endpoints for frontend communication
   - Signal Processing: Core algorithms for RF signal analysis
   - Peak Detection: Algorithms to identify signal peaks
   - Outlier Detection: Pattern matching for anomalous signals
   - Authentication Service: User verification
   - Data Export Service: Formatting results for export

3. **Database Components**:
   - User Data: User profiles and preferences
   - Dataset Storage: Raw uploaded signal data
   - Analysis Results: Processed results and findings
   - Pattern Definitions: User-defined patterns for analysis
   - Signal Metadata: Additional information about signals

## Data Flow Diagram

This diagram illustrates how data moves through the system during a typical analysis workflow.

```svg
<svg width="900" height="600" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
    <!-- Background -->
    <rect width="900" height="600" fill="#f8f9fa" rx="10" ry="10"/>
    
    <!-- Title -->
    <text x="450" y="40" font-family="Arial" font-size="24" text-anchor="middle" font-weight="bold" fill="#333">RF Signal Analyzer - Data Flow</text>
    
    <!-- User -->
    <circle cx="100" cy="150" r="50" fill="#e1bee7" stroke="#9c27b0" stroke-width="2"/>
    <text x="100" y="155" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" text-anchor="middle" fill="#333">Researcher</text>
    
    <!-- Upload Process -->
    <rect x="200" y="100" width="150" height="100" rx="10" ry="10" fill="#bbdefb" stroke="#2196f3" stroke-width="2"/>
    <text x="275" y="155" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" text-anchor="middle" fill="#333">Data Upload</text>
    
    <!-- Signal Processing -->
    <rect x="400" y="100" width="150" height="100" rx="10" ry="10" fill="#c8e6c9" stroke="#4caf50" stroke-width="2"/>
    <text x="475" y="155" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" text-anchor="middle" fill="#333">Signal Processing</text>
    
    <!-- Peak Detection -->
    <rect x="600" y="100" width="150" height="100" rx="10" ry="10" fill="#c8e6c9" stroke="#4caf50" stroke-width="2"/>
    <text x="675" y="155" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" text-anchor="middle" fill="#333">Peak Detection</text>
    
    <!-- Storage -->
    <path d="M400,300 L550,300 L550,350 L400,350 L400,300" fill="#ffe0b2" stroke="#ff9800" stroke-width="2"/>
    <path d="M400,300 C400,290 550,290 550,300" fill="#ffe0b2" stroke="#ff9800" stroke-width="2"/>
    <text x="475" y="330" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" text-anchor="middle" fill="#333">Database</text>
    
    <!-- Pattern Definition -->
    <rect x="200" y="300" width="150" height="100" rx="10" ry="10" fill="#bbdefb" stroke="#2196f3" stroke-width="2"/>
    <text x="275" y="340" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" text-anchor="middle" fill="#333">Pattern</text>
    <text x="275" y="360" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" text-anchor="middle" fill="#333">Definition</text>
    
    <!-- Outlier Detection -->
    <rect x="600" y="300" width="150" height="100" rx="10" ry="10" fill="#c8e6c9" stroke="#4caf50" stroke-width="2"/>
    <text x="675" y="340" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" text-anchor="middle" fill="#333">Outlier</text>
    <text x="675" y="360" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" text-anchor="middle" fill="#333">Detection</text>
    
    <!-- Visualization -->
    <rect x="400" y="450" width="150" height="100" rx="10" ry="10" fill="#bbdefb" stroke="#2196f3" stroke-width="2"/>
    <text x="475" y="490" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" text-anchor="middle" fill="#333">Results</text>
    <text x="475" y="510" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" text-anchor="middle" fill="#333">Visualization</text>
    
    <!-- Export -->
    <rect x="600" y="450" width="150" height="100" rx="10" ry="10" fill="#bbdefb" stroke="#2196f3" stroke-width="2"/>
    <text x="675" y="490" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" text-anchor="middle" fill="#333">Export</text>
    <text x="675" y="510" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" text-anchor="middle" fill="#333">(PDF, CSV)</text>
    
    <!-- Data Flow Arrows -->
    <!-- User to Upload -->
    <path d="M150,150 L200,150" stroke="#333" stroke-width="2" marker-end="url(#arrowhead)">
        <animate attributeName="stroke-dashoffset"
